name: Archer Hero Must Die
description:
‘Archer Hero Must Die’ is a casual game. Players control an archer and defeat one powerful enemy after another.
[Game Operation]
Press and hold the left mouse button to control the shooting angle, and release the left mouse button to shoot.
[Game features]
Click the mouse on the screen, adjust your arrow direction, and then kill your enemies. look out! When the enemy is not shot, the enemy will kill you.
The game is an endless mode.
You can unlock more characters by obtaining gold coins.
